title: Beginner Python Programming
description: Take your Python skills to the next level with this advanced programming course. Learn about advanced topics such as decorators.

title: Web Development Fundamentals
description: Learn the fundamentals of web development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Build and style your first website from scratch.

title: Introduction to JavaScript
description: Get started with JavaScript, the programming language of the web. Learn basic syntax, data types, and control structures.

title: Machine Learning Basics
description: Discover the basics of machine learning and build your first predictive models using Python and scikit-learn.

title: React.js Crash Course
description: Learn React.js, a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces. Create interactive web applications with ease.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms in Java
description: Master data structures and algorithms with Java. Solve coding problems and optimize performance in your applications.

title: Node.js Essentials
description: Learn the essentials of Node.js, a JavaScript runtime for building server-side applications. Create RESTful APIs and handle asynchronous operations.

title: Python for Data Science
description: Discover how Python is used in data science. Explore data analysis, visualization, and machine learning techniques.

title: Android App Development with Kotlin
description: Build Android apps with Kotlin, a modern programming language. Learn to create user interfaces, handle user input, and use device features.
